name: Memory mini game.
description:
Entry for Ludum dare 51. Theme: Every 10 seconds.

This is my first 2D game.

Hope you enjoy.

The first couple levels are for warmups and the timer is set shorter than ten seconds.

From above level four the timer is capped at ten seconds.

Instructions:

 Memorize the top icons in the top box and which box they are in.

 After ten seconds the icons will move to the bottom boxes.

 Click and drag the icons into the top boxes in the order of what you remember they were in.

 Press the "Submit answer" button and see if its correct.
If the incorrect icons are placed  and the "submit" button is pressed: the icons will immediately change to reveal what the correct answer is. -  this function isn't currently working well...

Icon images from: game-icons.net

Audio from:  freesound.org
